TestWriteFile.task: Print the the capital of America to a .txt file

TestSearch.task: Open 'https://silennaihin.com/random/plain.html' and paste the text on the page in a .txt file
TestSearch.answer:
This is a Heading
This is a paragraph.
TestSearch.description: Tests if an llm can search

TestReadFile.task: Write the string 'random string' before any existing text to the file called file_to_check.txt

TestBasicRetrieval.task: Write the price of the book in this url 'http://books.toscrape.com/catalogue/meditations_33/index.html' to a .txt file.
TestBasicRetrieval.description: Specifies specific website to retrieve website from.

TestBasicContentGen.task: Create a brief report or summary highlighting how one or more companies from companies.txt are addressing or capitalizing on challenges or trends from challenges.txt. Write a file called output.txt.
TestBasicContentGen.answer: A report highlighting elements from the 2 files.
TestBasicContentGen.description: Tests ability to generate content based on the content of 2 files.

TestBasicMemory.task: Follow the instructions in the instructions_1.txt file
TestBasicMemory.description: Tests ability for the agent to remember information between each action. An id is presented initially and the agent has to remember it after reading 4 other files

TestAdaptLink.task: Write the price of the book in this url 'books.toscrape.com/catalogue/meditations_33/index.html' to a .txt file.
TestAdaptLink.description: An advanced version of this -> remove.html as well. Same as TestBasicRetrieval but link is slightly broken, supposed to be http:// at the start.

TestRememberMultipleIds.task: Follow the instructions in the instructions_1.txt file
TestRememberMultipleIds.description: Tests ability for the agent to remember information between each action. Multiple ids are presented in different files and the last file instructs the agent to write these ids into another file.
